subject: Sales
title: Managing Your Online Reputation
description: A quick, practical guide to Managing Your Online Reputation.

hook.text: One angry review tops your search results while a thousand satisfied customers remain invisible.

buildup.text: Reputation management means actively monitoring and shaping what the internet says about you.

discovery.text: A professional reply to a negative review often impresses prospects more than the complaint hurts.

twist.text: Ignoring your online presence means others write your story. It may not be the version you'd choose.

climax.text: Set alerts for your name. Respond to reviews. Publish content. Control the narrative proactively.

punchline.text: If you don't manage your reputation, others will.
